entry.title: Ellen Plants Some Mysterious Seeds | Time For Yourself... with Ellen (Episode 3)

media:group.media:title: Ellen Plants Some Mysterious Seeds | Time For Yourself... with Ellen (Episode 3)
media:group.media:description:
On this episode of Time For Yourself... with Ellen, our host decides to try out some seeds she found in her shed with some helpful horticultural tips. Maybe "helpful" is the wrong word.

entry.title: Then & Now: #KrisJenner's First (2016) & Last (2022) Appearances on Ellen #shorts

entry.title: Then and Now: Kris Jenner's First and Last Appearances on 'The Ellen Show'

media:group.media:title: Then and Now: Kris Jenner's First and Last Appearances on 'The Ellen Show'
media:group.media:description:
Kris Jenner first visited Ellen in 2016 to talk about clothes-swapping with her family and the O.J. Simpson trial, and to play a game of “Who’d You Rather?” The world-famous business mogul made her last appearance in 2022 to talk about her growing family and predictions on her next grandchild.
SUBSCRIBE: https://ellen.tv/3D6Sewq

entry.title: Best of the Cast of Queer Eye

media:group.media:title: Best of the Cast of Queer Eye
media:group.media:description:
Ellen welcomed the original Fab Five to the show in 2004. Thom Filicia, Ted Allen, Carson Kressley, Kyan Douglas and Jai Rodriguez stopped by to help Ellen and the audience navigate some tricky etiquette questions. In 2021, guest host Beth Behrs chatted with Bobby Berk as they studied examples of some questionable interior design choices. In 2020, Karamo Brown came by to talk with guest host tWitch about family and — what else — dancing!
SUBSCRIBE: https://ellen.tv/3D6Sewq

entry.title: A Big Surprise for a Deserving Mom (Season 7)

media:group.media:title: A Big Surprise for a Deserving Mom (Season 7)
media:group.media:description:
Ellen sent Jeannie to Miami, Florida to surprise Maria Holloway with a chance to win big in her Gold Digger Machine. Maria left such a mark on Ellen, she was invited back through the years and became a part of “Ellen’s Lucky 13.”
